main event: An unidentified flying object was observed 600 miles west of Los Angeles, California on February 5, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of the moon with a narrow white flame behind it., The object moved at a speed comparable to that of a jet plane., Observers reported the object performed maneuvers consistent with a true meteor., The sighting lasted between 0.3 to 30 seconds., It was mentioned that the object faded into the atmosphere after leaving their field of vision.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with a narrow white flame
witness description: One observer, with additional comments from other observers regarding the sighting
